channel.title: [711] Create & Open New Dialogue From Command [Rep++]
channel.description:
I need to know how to create a new dialogue and open it from a command. I see that dialogues in 711 have their own classes, which is much harder than what something like 639 has.
If someone could link me to a tutorial, that would be amazing. I searched and searched to now avail.
Oh and all my dialogue needs is clickable options, no other text/dialogue.
